comments.body: This is one of the beautiful things about the Type/Signature split. We not only refine the type of `SymbolInformation.signature` (previously, `SymbolInformation.tpe`), but also gain precision in a lot of other places, e.g. here. Concretely, we observe that `toSemanticTpe` doesn't need linkMode, which is non-obvious and neat.
ðŸ˜ Thanks for the idea to split constant types even further!
I'm glad it came out nicely ðŸ‘

            val sparents = parents.map(loop)
